Plot: Wealthy San Francisco financier Nicholas Van Orton gets a strange birthday present from wayward brother Conrad: a live-action game that consumes his life.
Title: The Game
Actors: Michael Douglas, Sean Penn, Deborah Kara Unger, James Rebhorn
tomatoConsensus: The ending could use a little work but this is otherwise another sterling example of David Fincher's iron grip on atmosphere and storytelling.
